assessment.question:
What will happen in this loop?
	x = 5
	while x > 0:
		print(x)

What will be the output? 
	x = 0
	while x < 3:
		print(x)
		x += 1
A while loop runs as long as the __________ is True.
The while loop may cause an __________ loop if the condition never becomes False.
While loops always execute at least once.
